gw.api.database

Class QueryRestrictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.database.QueryRestrictor

  • public abstract class QueryRestrictor
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines new restrictions to apply to an existing query.

    • Method Detail

      • restrictOn

        public final IQuery restrictOn(IQuery iQuery)
        Given an IQuery, performs restriction operations specified by applyRestrictions(IQueryBuilder) on all parts that can receive additional restrictions.
        Parameters:
        iQuery - Query to apply restrictions on.
        Returns:
        Query resulting from the transformation.

      • buildQuery

        public final IQuery buildQuery(IEntityType type)
        Performs restriction operations specified by applyRestrictions(IQueryBuilder) on a newly-constructed query of the specified root type.
        Parameters:
        type - Root entity type of the query to construct.
        Returns:
        New Query with the restrictions specified by the QueryRestrictor.

      • applyRestrictions

        protected abstract IQuery applyRestrictions(IQueryBuilder iQuery)
        Given an IQuery that can receive additional restrictions, this is the place to apply them.
        Parameters:
        iQuery - Query to apply restrictions on.
        Returns:
        Query resulting from the transformation.

      • with

        public final QueryRestrictor with(QueryRestrictor rhs)
        Creates a composite QueryRestrictor with this one evaluated first and then the rhs evaluated second.
        Parameters:
        rhs - QueryRestrictor to be evaluated with this one.
        Returns:
        QueryRestrictor that evaluates this one first and then the rhs second.

      • asFilter

        public final com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter asFilter()
        Converts this QueryRestrictor into a QueryBasedQueryFilter that can be applied to IQueryResults.
        Returns:
        QueryBasedQueryFilter identical in function to the QueryRestrictor.
